forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of freezing rain possible early. Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 5C. SE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of freezing rain possible early. A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High near 40F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 34F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
